title: The S&P 500 Will Soon Face Fierce Resistance - Technical AND Political
text:
We often hear that the S&P 500 hasn't made any real progress since peaking in early 2018. This is obviously a true statementNonetheless, it can also be said that from late 2016 through early 2018 the equity market rallied further and faster than it reasonably should have to make the last two years of consolidation necessaryIn other words, exciteme...
